candidates.title: chore: release a new version for madsim and madsim-tokio
rdkafka: fix the error type of `DeliveryFuture`
feat(tonic): implement `balance_channel` for `Channel`
candidates.body: Add support for [`balance_channel`](https://docs.rs/tonic/latest/tonic/transport/struct.Channel.html#method.balance_channel) which could be used to connect multiple endpoints.

candidates.title: Revert "chore(rdkafka): bump rdkafka to v0.33.2 and librdkafka to v2.2.0 (#161)"
candidates.body:
This reverts commit 79cfa9dad2aa35db0343899245c0b500b2319530.

The new version has some bugs and is not available for use.

candidates.title: chore(rdkafka): bump rdkafka to v0.33.2 and librdkafka to v2.2.0
fix(tonic): add missing APIs
candidates.body: bump version of madsim-tonic and madsim-tonic-build to v0.3.1

candidates.title: feat(tonic): support setting timeout for each request
candidates.body:
resolve #155 

Also release v0.2.25 and yank v0.2.24 for madsim-aws-sdk-s3.

candidates.title: bump tonic version to v0.9
candidates.body:
... I'm wondering whether we need to bump major version https://github.com/madsim-rs/madsim/issues/145

changelog: https://github.com/hyperium/tonic/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md

I mainly want this: build:: Support boxing fields

candidates.title: Update Cargo.toml
candidates.body:
Updates dependency to the patch version of 0.9.8

[Advisory](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2023-0031.html)

candidates.title: fix: fix missing parts ordering in s3 simulator
feat(s3): bump aws-sdk-s3 to v0.28
candidates.body:
This PR bumps aws-sdk-s3 version to v0.28 and revises the corresponding simulation code.

- `XxxInput`, `XxxOutput` and `XxxError` types are removed and re-exported from the aws-sdk-s3 crate.
- operations are reorganized into the `operation` module, one file per function

candidates.title: feat: expose `TaskLocalFuture`
candidates.body: This PR exposes `TaskLocalFuture` from `tokio`, which is also part of the `task_local` API.

candidates.title: fix(etcd):  fix the behavior when campaign is called twice
feat: support auto restarting on panic with certain messages
fix(tonic): fix panic on server closed. add `time::advance`
candidates.body:
```
thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Status { code: Unavailable, message: "connection reset", source: None }', /Users/wangrunji/Codes/madsim/madsim-tonic/src/client.rs:164:22
```

candidates.title: fix: fix task leak on RPC server
feat: fix dropping tokio `Runtime` and add `AbortHandle`
